identity.title: The Roaring Knight
identity.description: THEY WHO WILL BRING THE DARK.

commands: effect clear @s minecraft:blindness
effect clear @s minecraft:darkness
effect clear @s minecraft:wither
effect give @s minecraft:night_vision 15 0 true
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..4] run effect give @s minecraft:darkness 3 0 true
particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~0 ~ 0.4 0.1 0.4 0.01 2
particle minecraft:smoke ~ ~0 ~ 0.3 0.3 0.3 0.005 1
execute if predicate eternalheros:random_1_percent run playsound minecraft:entity.warden.heartbeat master @s ~ ~ ~ 0.15 0.8
execute if predicate eternalheros:random_1_percent run playsound minecraft:particle.soul_escape master @s ~ ~ ~ 0.2 0.7
execute if predicate eternalheros:random_1_percent run playsound minecraft:block.sculk_sensor.clicking master @s ~ ~ ~ 0.1 0.5
execute if score @s dark_harvest_cd matches ..0 if entity @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..5,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:15}]}] run effect give @s minecraft:regeneration 2 2 true
execute if score @s dark_harvest_cd matches ..0 if entity @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..5,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:15}]}] run particle minecraft:heart ~ ~1.5 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.1 3
execute if score @s dark_harvest_cd matches ..0 if entity @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..5,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:15}]}] run scoreboard players set @s dark_harvest_cd 60
scoreboard players remove @s dark_harvest_cd 1
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,scores={shadow_mark=1..}] run scoreboard players remove @s shadow_mark 1
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,scores={shadow_mark=100..}] at @s run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.01 1

combat_tree.title: Shadow Blade Arts
combat_tree.description: Master the blade infused with darkness.

entity_data.CommandOnEntityHit: execute as @e[distance=..2,type=!minecraft:player] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200

dark_slash.title: Dark Slash
dark_slash.description: A vicious melee attack that inflicts withering darkness.
commands: particle minecraft:squid_ink ^ ^1 ^2 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.1 30
particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^1 ^2 0 0 0 0 2
particle minecraft:explosion ^ ^1 ^2 0.3 0.3 0.3 0.1 5
particle minecraft:smoke ^ ^1 ^2 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] run damage @s 15 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] run effect give @s minecraft:wither 5 2
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.sweep master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.7
playsound minecraft:entity.warden.attack_impact master @a ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0.8

shadow_strike.title: Shadow Strike
shadow_strike.description: Dash forward through shadows, striking all in your path.
commands: execute positioned ^ ^ ^1 run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.05 30
execute positioned ^ ^ ^1 run particle minecraft:soul ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^ ^2 run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.05 30
execute positioned ^ ^ ^2 run particle minecraft:soul ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^ ^3 run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.05 30
execute positioned ^ ^ ^3 run particle minecraft:soul ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^ ^4 run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.05 30
execute positioned ^ ^ ^4 run particle minecraft:soul ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^ ^5 run particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.05 30
execute positioned ^ ^ ^5 run particle minecraft:soul ~ ~1 ~ 0.2 0.4 0.2 0.05 15
execute positioned ^ ^ ^1 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run damage @s 12 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^ ^1 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
execute positioned ^ ^ ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run damage @s 12 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^ ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
execute positioned ^ ^ ^3 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run damage @s 12 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^ ^3 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
execute positioned ^ ^ ^4 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run damage @s 12 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^ ^4 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
execute positioned ^ ^ ^5 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run damage @s 12 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^ ^5 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..2] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
playsound minecraft:entity.enderman.teleport master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.8
playsound minecraft:entity.warden.sonic_charge master @a ~ ~ ~ 0.6 1.2

executioner_blow.title: Executioner's Blow
executioner_blow.description: A devastating strike with all your dark power. High damage, long cooldown.
commands: particle minecraft:squid_ink ^ ^1 ^2 1 1 1 0.2 100
particle minecraft:explosion ^ ^1 ^2 0 0 0 1 5
particle minecraft:crimson_spore ^ ^1 ^2 0.8 0.8 0.8 0.3 50
particle minecraft:smoke ^ ^1 ^2 1 1 1 0.1 40
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3,limit=1,sort=nearest] run damage @s 40 minecraft:generic
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3,limit=1,sort=nearest] run effect give @s minecraft:slowness 10 4
execute positioned ^ ^1 ^2 as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3,limit=1,sort=nearest] run scoreboard players set @s shadow_mark 200
playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode master @a ~ ~ ~ 2 0.8
playsound minecraft:entity.player.attack.crit master @a ~ ~ ~ 2 0.5
playsound minecraft:entity.warden.attack_impact master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.6

shadow_tree.title: Shadow Manipulation
shadow_tree.description: Harness the power of darkness itself.

shadow_veil.title: Shadow Veil
shadow_veil.description: Become one with the shadows, rendering yourself invisible.

commands: particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.01 2

dark_teleport.title: Dark Teleport
dark_teleport.description: Instantly teleport through shadows to where you're looking.
commands: particle minecraft:portal ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 1 0.5 1 100
particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 1 0.5 0.1 50
playsound minecraft:entity.enderman.teleport master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.5

shadow_snare.title: Shadow Snare
shadow_snare.description: Trap nearby enemies in shadowy tendrils, slowing and weakening them. Bonus damage to marked enemies.
commands: particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 5 1 5 0.1 100
particle minecraft:portal ~ ~1 ~ 5 1 5 0.2 80
particle minecraft:sculk_soul ~ ~1 ~ 5 1 5 0.1 50
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..6] run effect give @s minecraft:slowness 10 4
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..6] run effect give @s minecraft:weakness 10 2
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..6] run effect give @s minecraft:darkness 10 0
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..6,scores={shadow_mark=1..}] run damage @s 10 minecraft:magic
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..6,scores={shadow_mark=1..}] run particle minecraft:soul_fire_flame ~ ~1 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.1 20
playsound minecraft:block.roots.place master @a ~ ~ ~ 2 0.5
playsound minecraft:entity.warden.heartbeat master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.7
playsound minecraft:block.sculk_shrieker.shriek master @a ~ ~ ~ 0.6 0.8

umbral_wave.title: Umbral Wave
umbral_wave.description: Release a devastating wave of darkness, dealing damage and spreading despair. Massive bonus damage to marked enemies.
commands: particle minecraft:squid_ink ~ ~1 ~ 8 2 8 0.3 200
particle minecraft:smoke ~ ~1 ~ 8 2 8 0.2 100
particle minecraft:warped_spore ~ ~1 ~ 8 2 8 0.3 150
particle minecraft:sculk_soul ~ ~1 ~ 8 2 8 0.2 100
particle minecraft:portal ~ ~1 ~ 8 2 8 0.5 200
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..10] run damage @s 20 minecraft:magic
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..10,scores={shadow_mark=1..}] run damage @s 20 minecraft:magic
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..10,scores={shadow_mark=1..}] run particle minecraft:soul_fire_flame ~ ~1 ~ 0.8 0.8 0.8 0.2 30
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..10] run effect give @s minecraft:wither 8 3
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..10] run effect give @s minecraft:darkness 15 0
playsound minecraft:entity.warden.sonic_boom master @a ~ ~ ~ 2 0.5
playsound minecraft:entity.wither.spawn master @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1.5
playsound minecraft:block.sculk_shrieker.shriek master @a ~ ~ ~ 1.5 0.6

ball_mode.title: Ball Mode
ball_mode.description: Transform into a ball of pure darkness. Cannot use other abilities while active.

commands: effect give @e[distance=..1.5] minecraft:darkness 10 1 true
execute as @e[distance=0.01..2] run damage @s 5 minecraft:magic

the_roaring.title: The Roaring
the_roaring.description: §c§lULTIMATE§r: Unleash The Roaring! Create a dark fountain that spreads chaos and destruction.
